Posts.Content: On Feb 24, 2011 4:28 AM Dgirl wrote: Mom was recently diagnosed with stage IV BC that metastisized to her lungs. I wanted to get some feedback on Survivors (and/or) Successful Alternative treatments. I have been researching on a lot of different sites and am befuddled from all of the different information I've come across. Please help. Â  Thank you, Dgirl Hi Dgirl, There are no known side affects noted. Google maple syrup and bicarbonate. There are many believers. If you try it small amounts cooked 45 seconds in a microwave is easy. OldAxe 80 +
Posts.Title: Are there any stage IV breast cancer survivors thru alternative treatments????
